Introduction

A.FACT was a South Korean pre-debut band under A.Conic and Stallion Entertainment. Consisting of five members: Sejin, Wondae, Bawool, Hoseong, and Taeeun, the group started as a debut project by Stallion X A.Conic in July, 2019.

On October 30, 2019 Stallion Entertainment announced that they will begin overseas activities. The official debut date never got announced.

Current state:
